sub_title: Commissioning & Implementation manager, Senior Process engineer, (Technical) Project lead, Performance engineering coordinator at RWE Generation
summary:
Profile:
Results-oriented team/project lead and enthusiastic team player with a passion for the energy business continuously searching for and working on business improvements and opportunities.

Mission: Contribute to the realisation of a reliable, sustainable and affordable future energy system.

Key areas of expertise are:
Biomass, Performance engineering, Project management, Commissioning & implementation (OIP), Process engineering, Process safety, Combined heat and power, Combined cycle, Conceptual design, Thermodynamic modeling, Water chemistry

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the design, commissioning & implementation (OIP) of the Amer Biomass Conversion project. This (brownfield) project (CAPEX 60 Meuro) converts the coal fired Amer 9 Power plant in Geertruidenberg to a > 80% biomass fired CHP implementing amonst others a new mechanical transport system, ship unloader, primary air system upgrade, dewatering installation & mills conversion.
	Responsibilities include: 
	- Managing OIP team
	- Commissioning & integrating the new systems in a running PP
	- Conceptional design (set-up the design justification document)
	- Performance (2020 results exceed all design criteria & expectations)
profile_positions.title: Commissioning & Implementation Manager & Lead Process Engineer Amer Biomass Conversion project

profile_positions.description:
This position held 3 main roles: 
1) (Technical) Project manager
2) RWE GCC Performance engineering (PE) coordinator 
3) Senior process engineer

ad 1) 
Iinitiating and leading business improvement, business development and modification projects such as: 
- Future CHPP Swentibold & Inesco 2(2016 & 2017)
- Debottlenecking project Water treatment Unit CHP (2016 & 2017)
- R&D project Torbico @ BioPark Amer (2017)
- Conversion of existing gas oil (diesel) fired boilers in Tilburg and 
Breda to enable combustion of sustainable bio-oil (2015 & 2016)
 - Igrowth 2.0: Development of a new HP steam back-up boiler until 25% budget level in cooperation with steam customer Ineos (2016)
- Declaration optimisation project resulting in the initiation of the new declaration tool NFRS (Neartime and Future Range Scheduler, 2015)
- Flexibility project CHPP Swentibold resulting in 7 new performance improvements/ideas with an added value of >1 Meuro/year (2014)

ad 2) 
Being the RWE GCC PE coordinator for biomass/coal and gas-fired PP in The Netherlands, Belgium and Germany responsibilities included:
- Providing technical and organisational support to the performance engineers at the power plants.
- Developing RWE performance engineering ways of working
- Securing and developing performance engineering knowledge e.g. by initiating the Centre of Competence Performance Engineering
- Transfer of best practices
- Chairman of performance engineering meetings
- Tracking & tracing of performance improvements
- Representing GCC in the COC performance engineering

ad 3) 
Providing process technology support to power stations or external business mainly in the fields of water steam chemistry, process safety,  performance engineering and energy optimisation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Process Engineer, (Technical) Project manager and GCC performance engineering coordinator

profile_positions.description:
MGE PE responsibilites included managing the following business improvement projects:
- Emergency power supply by CHP Eindhoven, Bergen op Zoom and ‘s-Hertogenbosch
- Development of small sized CHPs at CHP Eindhoven in cooperation with Ennatuurlijk
- Conversion of a gas fired boiler to bio-oil at CHP Eindhoven
- Feasibility study: Commercial & technical consequences of district heating supply to Enschede by Twence without CHP.
profile_positions.title: Performance engineer MGE (Mid sized gas-fired PP) and GCN PE coordinator for BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
Engineering manager Claus C aftercare project 
Responsibilities included:
- Managing engineering team (21 fte)
- Definition of the aftercare engineering scope & budget (> 10 Meuro)
- Coordination of engineering activities with the engineering team, suppliers, commissioning manager, plant manager and project manager.
- Finalisation of the aftercare engineering scope
profile_positions.title: Engineering manager Claus C Project

profile_positions.description:
Claus C project: re-powering the 1976 Claus B unit into a combined cycle gasturbine powerplant (CCGT) named Claus C with a power output of 1304 MWe @ 59% efficiency and suitable for daily start/stop operation (investment > 1 billion euro).
Responsibilities included:
- Managing Claus C process team (3 fte)
- Providing technical input for permit requests and static file
- Providing process related contractual documentation (e.g. performance and guarantee documents)
- Process safety (HAZID, HAZOP, SIL, PSSR, Explosion protection)
- Engineering (review) activities
- Troubleshooting and commissioning activities
- Functional tests and performance tests
- Interface management
- Performance optimization
- Water chemistry including deminwater preparation
profile_positions.title: Lead Process Engineer at the Claus C project

profile_positions.description:
The CHP Inesco is a 130 MWe CHPP providing utilities (steam, boiler feed water, demin water, power) to Ineos and power to the Belgium grid. It was the first power plant for Essent in Belgium and I have been involved from the start of the project (idea phase) until handover and commercial operation in 2008.
Responsibilities included contractual project specifications, conceptual design (Basis of Design), process safety (HAZID, HAZOP, SIL, PSSR), engineering review activities, equipment sizing, troubleshooting, performance monitoring, functional and performance tests.
profile_positions.title: Process/project engineer at the CHP Inesco Project

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities included:
- Troubleshooting & executing process calculations for the wood gasifier project in Geertruidenberg.
- Providing process descriptions for the Amer 9 SCR DeNOx project.
- Providing proposals for modifications to exisiting installations
- Executing process optimisations at the waste processing plant in Wijster.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer
